channel.title: Help! this is realy makeing me mad!
channel.description:
OK! I'm makeing my server for the very first time and the problem is...
When i try to run my source it says i need latest jdk i got Freakin jdk 6-u-5 :mad: and i did the enviroment variables so... i did classpath and path thing never came up saying what i put in was rong so... maybe im rong or what?
or do i have to download more stuff? or... do i have to get like a client.java where do it get that? :confused: :confused:
sorry im such a noob.... just this is kinda hard and im tired of admins banning me from their servers for no reason thats why i want my own so please! help!!! :(
oh and please dont just read try and give me helpfull things that may help if you know nothin of my problem
i tried downloading different sources but none of them work for me...

item.title: Help! this is realy makeing me mad!

@freakinlost wrote:

where i get the compiler sorry im not to familier to this[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 16, 2008, 03:43:40 AM[/size][hr]just pm me i cant do this all night i need to get rest before i get realy mad and smash my comp just like the crazy unreal turnament kid on youtube and lose my escape button…
